Description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) Office of Health, Safety and Security's Office of Enforcement and Oversight issued a Consent Order (NCO-2014-01) to UChicago Argonne, LLC, relating to the incorrect nuclear facility hazard categorization of Building 205 G-Wing at DOE's Argonne National Laboratory. The contractor agreed to the Consent Order. The penalty took the form of a contract fee reduction.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php

Private Litigation Case Title: Daugherty et al v. The University Of Chicago

Info Source: Contained in a list obtained from the agency on October 8, 2020 in response to an open records request.
